divs: sighting detailswhen i first saw the object i thought it was a star. it wasn't moving. then it began to pick up speed which was much faster then an aircraft. the object moved se from my position n. of buena vista, co. the object did not have red or green\blue position lighting on the wings or strobe lights. the object had a magnitude of a primary star which was n. of the object and east of me. the estimated distance was 10 miles and altitude of 10-15 thousand. the object disappeared quickly as it descended behind a mountain. it was not a meteor. i am a retired corporate pilot. this is the second report i have filed since 2000. view my last report - reported: 8\24\2000 13:39 posted: 3\21\2003 location: vail, az
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Buena Vista
There were no other sightings in Buena Vista on or around December 23rd 2009
